00023 #include <Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC.h>
00024 #include <Fluide_Quasi_Compressible.h>
00025 #include <Op_Conv_negligeable.h>
00026 #include <Frontiere_dis_base.h>
00027 #include <Navier_Stokes_std.h>
00028 #include <Probleme_base.h>
00029 #include <Discret_Thyd.h>
00030 #include <Param.h>
00031 
00032 Implemente_instanciable_sans_constructeur(Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC,"Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC",Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base);
00033 // XD convection_diffusion_chaleur_QC eqn_base convection_diffusion_chaleur_QC -1 Temperature equation for a quasi-compressible fluid.
00034 // XD attr mode_calcul_convection chaine(into=["ancien","divuT_moins_Tdivu","divrhouT_moins_Tdivrhou"]) mode_calcul_convection 1 Option to set the form of the convective operatorNL2 divrhouT_moins_Tdivrhou (the default since 1.6.8): rho.u.gradT = div(rho.u.T )- Tdiv(rho.u.1) NL2ancien: u.gradT = div(u.T) - T.div(u) NL2 divuT_moins_Tdivu : u.gradT = div(u.T) - Tdiv(u.1)
00035 
00036 Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC::Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC():mode_convection_(2) { }

00049 void Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC::set_param(Param& param)
00050 {
00051   Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base::set_param(param);
00052   param.ajouter_non_std("mode_calcul_convection",(this));
00053 }
00054 
00055 int Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC::lire_motcle_non_standard(const Motcle& mot, Entree& is)
00056 {
00057   if (mot=="convection")
00058     {
00059       Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base::lire_motcle_non_standard(mot,is);
00060 
00061 // l'equation de la chaleur en quasi compressible contient un terme source dP/dt
00062       Cerr << "Source term creation of the energy equation :"<< finl;
00063       Source t;
00064       Source& so=les_sources.add(t);
00065       Nom type_so = "Source_QC_Chaleur_";
00066       Nom disc = discretisation().que_suis_je();
00067       if (disc=="VEFPreP1B") disc = "VEF";
00068       type_so += disc;
00069       so.typer_direct(type_so);
00070       so->associer_eqn(*this);
00071       Cerr<<so->que_suis_je()<<finl;
00072       Cerr << "Typing of the convection operator : ";
00073       return 1;
00074     }
00075   else if (mot=="mode_calcul_convection")
00076     {
00077       if (terme_convectif.non_nul())
00078         {
00079           Cerr<<" The option "<<mot<<" must be indicated before the convection operator."<<finl;
00080           Cerr<<" Please modify your data set."<<finl;
00081           exit();
00082         }
00083       Motcles modes(3);
00084       modes[0]="ancien"; //!< Default mode before 1.6.8 (wrong in VEF)
00085       modes[1]="divuT_moins_Tdivu"; //!< OK in VDF and VEF
00086       modes[2]="divrhouT_moins_Tdivrhou"; //!< Default mode after 1.6.8 (better)
00087       Motcle mot2;
00088       is>>mot2;
00089       mode_convection_=modes.search(mot2);
00090       if (mode_convection_==0)
00091         {
00092           Cerr << "WARNING! This mode is not supported anymore." << finl;
00093         }
00094       if (mode_convection_==-1)
00095         {
00096           Cerr<<" Allowed keywords for option mode_calcul_convection are :"<<finl;
00097           Cerr<<modes<<finl;
00098           exit();
00099         }
00100       return 1;
00101     }
00102   else
00103     return Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base::lire_motcle_non_standard(mot,is);
00104   return 1;
00105 }
00106 
00107 const Champ_base& Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC::vitesse_pour_transport()
00108 {
00109   if (mode_convection_==2) return Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base::vitesse_pour_transport();
00110   else
00111     {
00112       const Probleme_base& pb = probleme();
00113       const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,pb.equation(0));
00114       return eqn_hydr.inconnue() /* u */ ;
00115     }
00116 }
00117 
00118 void Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC::calculer_div_u_ou_div_rhou(DoubleTab& Div) const
00119 {
00120 // No convective operator:
00121   if (sub_type(Op_Conv_negligeable,operateur(1).l_op_base()))
00122     {
00123       Div=0;
00124       return;
00125     }
00126 
00127   if (mode_convection_!=0)
00128     Convection_Diffusion_Fluide_Dilatable_Proto::calculer_div_rho_u_impl(Div,*this);
00129   else
00130     {
00131 // Compute Div([rho]u) with Divergence operator
00132       const Navier_Stokes_std& eqn_hydr = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,probleme().equation(0));
00133       const DoubleTab& pression = eqn_hydr.pression().valeurs();
00134       const Champ_Inc& vitesse = eqn_hydr.inconnue();
00135 
00136 // Div = Div([rho]u) located on pressure nodes:
00137       DoubleTab Div_on_pressure_nodes(pression);
00138       eqn_hydr.operateur_divergence().calculer(vitesse.valeurs(),Div_on_pressure_nodes);
00139 
00140 // Test on the discretization:
00141       if (vitesse.valeurs().line_size() > 1) //!< VEF
00142         {
00143 // VEF (temperature and pressure are not the same) =>  Div extrapolated on velocity nodes:
00144           DoubleTab Div_on_temperature_nodes(inconnue().valeurs());
00145           Div_on_pressure_nodes.echange_espace_virtuel();
00146           ref_cast_non_const(Fluide_Quasi_Compressible,le_fluide.valeur()).divu_discvit(Div_on_pressure_nodes,Div_on_temperature_nodes);
00147           const int nsom = Div_on_temperature_nodes.dimension_tot(0);
00148           for (int i=0 ; i<nsom ; i++) Div(i)=Div_on_temperature_nodes(i);
00149         }
00150       else//!< VDF (temperature and pressure nodes are the same):
00151         Div = Div_on_pressure_nodes;
00152 
00153       Div *= -1;
00154     }
00155 }
00156 
00157 int Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_QC::preparer_calcul()
00158 {
00159   Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base::preparer_calcul();
00160   return mode_convection_ == 0 ? 1 :
00161          Convection_Diffusion_Chaleur_Fluide_Dilatable_base::remplir_cl_modifiee();
00162 }
